entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carlyle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Becoming a few clouds late this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
